response.content:
{
  "step1": "Gather ingredients for a decadent chocolate cake suitable for eight servings. Measure 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 cups granulated sugar, ¾ cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1½ teaspoons baking soda, and 1 teaspoon salt. Preheat oven to 350°F and grease two 8-inch round cake pans thoroughly now.",
  "step2": "In a large bowl, whisk 1 cup milk, ½ cup vegetable oil, 2 eggs, and 2 teaspoons vanilla extract until smooth. Slowly stir in mixture of dry ingredients, combining thoroughly to avoid lumps. Ensure batter is consistent and well-blended before pouring evenly into prepared pans for perfect texture every time.",
  "step3": "Place pans in preheated oven and bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Rotate pans halfway through baking for even rising. Allow cakes to cool in pans for ten minutes before transferring to a wire rack to rest completely with care.",
  "step4": "Meanwhile, prepare rich chocolate frosting by creaming ½ cup softened butter with 2 cups powdered sugar, ¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder, and 2 tablespoons milk. Blend ingredients until smooth and airy. Taste, adjust sweetness as desired, and refrigerate slightly to achieve spreadable consistency perfect for layering and decorating with precision.",
  "step5": "Place one cooled cake layer on an elegant serving plate. Evenly spread a thick layer of chocolate frosting over the surface. Gently top with the second cake layer and continue applying remaining frosting between layers and along sides. Smooth out edges meticulously, ensuring a uniform cover for a delightful presentation.",
  "step6": "Allow the assembled cake to rest for an additional fifteen minutes, facilitating frosting set and flavor melding. Garnish with chocolate shavings or fresh berries as desired. Slice carefully into eight equal portions, ensuring each serving retains the moist texture and velvety taste. Enjoy every bite of your homemade chocolate indulgence."
}
